product_title: Croma 1.5 Ton Portable AC (Dust Filter, Copper Condenser, CRLA018PAA025801)
overview_text:
Powerful Cooling
With an airflow volume of up to 450CMH, the Croma CRLA018PAA025801 1.5-ton Portable Air Conditioner delivers efficiently making it a good choice for rooms up to 170Sq.Ft. Moreover, you can experience the benefit of quick cooling with this Portable Air Conditioner, which employs fast cooling to rapidly create a comfortable indoor environment. Whether it's work-related stress or simply a hot day, this AC guarantees you a speedy rejuvenation as you return home.
Sleep Mode
With the sleep mode feature in this air conditioner, you can experience optimal cooling designed to keep your nights comfortable.
Self-Diagnosis
You can utilise Self-Diagnosis for optimising performance and detecting potential malfunctions in your air conditioner. This feature ensures efficient operation and timely identification of issues for prompt resolution.
Temperature Sensor
The temperature sensor in this air conditioner is a vital component that precisely measures the ambient temperature in the room. This information is then used to regulate the cooling settings, ensuring optimal comfort and energy efficiency.
Single Rotary Fixed Speed Compressor
This 1.5-ton AC is equipped with a sturdy single rotary fixed speed compressor for high cooling performance and long-term durability.
Energy-Efficient AC
Designed with your budget in mind, this air conditioner features a and consumes as little as 2300W, providing energy-efficient cooling to keep your costs down.
Copper Condenser Coil
With its copper condenser coil, this Croma air conditioner maximises heat exchange efficiency, resulting in quick and effective cooling for your room.
Anti-Dust Filter
Equipped with an effective anti-dust filter that is designed to capture dust, allergens, and airborne impurities, this AC makes sure that your indoor air remains fresh and free of contaminants.
Auto-Restart
You can experience continuous comfort with this AC's auto-restart function, which ensures uninterrupted cooling in your space.
R410A Refrigerant
Featuring R410A refrigerant, this air conditioner is engineered for eco-conscious and efficient cooling, reducing its impact on the environment.
key_features: 1 Year Comprehensive Warranty, 5 Years Compressor Warranty
